basic_information.scholarship_name: Tom & Mary Kate Aldridge Special Education Scholarship
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Tom & Mary Kate Aldridge Special Education

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are majoring in Special Education. Eligibility Requirements Must be majoring in Special Education Enrolled full-time Â– (12) hours undergraduate, (9) hours graduate Minimum 3.0 GPA Outstanding service as a past or current student of the UCO Student Council for Exceptional Children Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
